description: Monster pocket potions: Wizards may spawn with a consumable potion and will sometimes drink it mid-fight; levitation now enables monster pathing across chasms. Save version bumped to v38.
summary: Added Entity::pocketConsumable (v38) and serialize it in saves so monsters can carry a single stackable consumable item.
Wizards can now spawn with a pocket potion (heal, regen, shielding, invisibility, levitation).
AI: Wizards will sometimes drink their pocket potion mid-fight; 'obvious' effects can identify the potion if observed.
AI pathfinding: added a Levitate path mode so levitating monsters can route across chasms.
Updated README + CHANGELOG; bumped save version to v38 and included pocket consumable in determinism hash.
